abstract: The Federal Reserve needs a leader who is tough on big banks, and it’s unlikely to get one soon, an economist writes.
snippet: The Federal Reserve needs a leader who is tough on big banks, and it’s unlikely to get one soon, an economist writes.
lead_paragraph: 9:56 p.m. | Updated to clarify that precise impact of Volcker Rule depends on final form.

headline.main: Choosing the Next Head of the Federal Reserve
